summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6200 for the improvement of Americus Street from Columbian Way to 26th Avenue South; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88219, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
